abstract: Consumers across country express anger at timing of Cuisinart food processor recall, occurring so close to holidays, when indications are that manufacturer was aware of blade defect as early as 2011; consumers are also reporting that hotlines to request replacement blades are constantly busy or unable to process claims.
lead_paragraph: Trouble with blades in the food processor has led to one of the largest appliance recalls on record and has cooks checking their machines.
snippet: Trouble with blades in the food processor has led to one of the largest appliance recalls on record and has cooks checking their machines....

headline.main: Cuisinart Recall ‘Just Screwed Up the Holidays for a Lot of People’
headline.print_headline: Cuisinart Recall Leaves Cooks With Conundrum as Holidays Draw Near
